CodeActAgent.description: Expert in analyzing code, fixing bugs, and diagnosing software issues. Use for code-related troubleshooting, runtime errors, and application logic problems.

DevOpsAgent.description: Specialist in infrastructure, cloud services, and operations. Use for infrastructure configuration, Kubernetes management, networking, deployments, and infrastructure as code.

SREAgent.description: Expert in monitoring, observability, and reliability analysis. Use for log analysis, metrics interpretation, health checks, performance monitoring, alerting systems, and availability troubleshooting.
